GSD.description:
drm/bridge: Add missing pm_runtime_put_sync

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit ff13c90d7f7ab606b37be6d15140d19013d6736c. For more details please see the references link.
